bug.short_desc: Add image preloading of all / a set of images

long_desc.thetext:
Right now images are only loaded when a widget is displayed. This results in ugly display effects and a bad perceived performance. Please add a convenient method that loads all images that are used in the application.
Some thoughts: - Perhaps qx.io.ImageLoader can be extended - Started manually when application is completely loaded - Load all images that are hold in the resource manager - The method should not interrupt the user (perhaps the loading can be interrupted when user events like mouse clicks / keyboard events / rendering of UI is performed; started in an timeout) - Once started it should always start automatically when new parts, with new resources are loaded - The method might have a selector parameter, e.g. [button-*, window-*] to load only certain images - Perhaps the method can only be used to load the images for certain ui widgets (e.g. all states of a Button Widget, found in the appearance/decorator of a widget)
